text: is a Japanese football player. He played for the Japan national team. ==Biography== Hatanaka was born in Yokohama on August 25, 1995. He joined J2 League club Tokyo Verdy from their youth team in 2014. However there were few opportunities to play. In 2016, he moved to FC Machida Zelvia on loan. He played many matches as center back. In 2017, he returned to Verdy and played many matches. In August 2018, he moved to J1 League club Yokohama F. Marinos. In 2019, Yokohama won the J1 champions.
